events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to return it because it doesn't fit and would like a refund.
The issue has been identified as a refund request related to a return due to sizing problems.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund case for this return request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your issue. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been opened or used in any way?
The order number is 987654321, and I haven't worn the jacket yet. The tags are still attached.
Thanks for the information. You can return the jacket within 30 days for a full refund. I will send you the return label shortly.
Great, thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the help and will send the jacket back as soon as I get the label.
The return label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the jacket, we will process your refund immediately.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the return label and if you need any further assistance with the refund process.
Yes, I received it and dropped the jacket off yesterday at the post office. Thanks for following up!
Your return was received and your refund has been processed. You should see the refund on your account within 3-5 business days.
We have sent you a short survey to get your feedback on the refund process. We would appreciate your input.
I completed the survey and appreciate how smooth and timely the refund was handled. Thank you!
We are closing this case as your refund was successfully processed and you have provided positive feedback. Thank you for being our customer.
